thread.section_title: Gardner-White Furniture Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Gardner-White Furniture | www.gardner-white.com | 21 of 227
thread.title: Scott G
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Scott G

author: Scott G
title: Scott G
text: The automated call gave me a two-hour window in the early morning. I was able to work my schedule around the delivery. A second call followed when the crew was ten minutes away. A three-man crew offloaded and set up the sectional and ottoman in about 5-10 minutes. Very efficient and clear communication. Would definitely use Gardner-White in the future.
